verses.verse: Then Samuel <S%H8050><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the vial <S%H6378><s%> of oil, <S%H8081><s%> and poured <S%H3332><s%> it on his head, <S%H7218><s%> and kissed <S%H5401><s%> him, <S%H559><s%> and said, "Isn't <S%H3068><s%> it that Yahweh has anointed <S%H4886><s%> you to be prince <S%H5057><s%> over his inheritance? <S%H5159><s%>

When you have departed <S%H3212><s%> from me <S%H5978><s%> today, <S%H3117><s%> then you shall find <S%H4672><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> men <S%H582><s%> by Rachel <S%H7354><s%>'s tomb, <S%H6900><s%> in the border <S%H1366><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> at Zelzah; <S%H6766><s%> and they will tell <S%H559><s%> you, <S%H860><s%> 'The donkeys which you went <S%H1980><s%> to seek <S%H1245><s%> have been found; <S%H4672><s%> and behold, <S%H1><s%> your father has stopped <S%H5203><s%> caring <S%H1697><s%> about the donkeys, <S%H860><s%> and is anxious <S%H1672><s%> for you, <S%H559><s%> saying, "What shall I do <S%H6213><s%> for my son? <S%H1121><s%>"'

"Then you shall go on <S%H2498><s%> forward <S%H1973><s%> from there, <S%H935><s%> and you shall come to the oak <S%H436><s%> of Tabor; <S%H8396><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> men <S%H582><s%> shall meet <S%H4672><s%> you there going up <S%H5927><s%> to God <S%H430><s%> to Bethel, <S%H1008><s%> one <S%H259><s%> carrying <S%H5375><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> young goats, <S%H1423><s%> and another <S%H259><s%> carrying <S%H5375><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> loaves <S%H3603><s%> of bread, <S%H3899><s%> and another <S%H259><s%> carrying <S%H5375><s%> a bottle <S%H5035><s%> of wine: <S%H3196><s%>
and they will <S%H7592><s%> greet <S%H7965><s%> you, <S%H5414><s%> and give you two <S%H8147><s%> loaves of bread, <S%H3899><s%> which you shall receive <S%H3947><s%> of their hand. <S%H3027><s%>

"After <S%H310><s%> that you shall come <S%H935><s%> to the hill <S%H1389><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> where is the garrison <S%H5333><s%> of the Philistines: <S%H6430><s%> and it shall happen, <S%H935><s%> when you have come there to the city, <S%H5892><s%> that you shall meet <S%H6293><s%> a band <S%H2256><s%> of prophets <S%H5030><s%> coming down <S%H3381><s%> from the high place <S%H1116><s%> with a psaltery, <S%H5035><s%> and a tambourine, <S%H8596><s%> and a pipe, <S%H2485><s%> and a harp, <S%H3658><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them; <S%H5012><s%> and they will be prophesying:

and the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will come <S%H6743><s%> mightily on you, <S%H5012><s%> and you shall prophesy with them, <S%H2015><s%> and shall be turned into another <S%H312><s%> man. <S%H376><s%>
Let it be, <S%H226><s%> when these signs have come <S%H935><s%> to you, <S%H6213><s%> that you do as occasion <S%H4672><s%> shall serve <S%H3027><s%> you; <S%H430><s%> for God is with you.

"You shall go down <S%H3381><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me to Gilgal; <S%H1537><s%> and behold, <S%H3381><s%> I will come down to you, <S%H5927><s%> to offer burnt offerings, <S%H5930><s%> and to sacrifice <S%H5927><s%> sacrifices <S%H2076><s%> of peace offerings: <S%H5930><s%> you shall wait <S%H3176><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> until I come <S%H935><s%> to you, <S%H3045><s%> and show you what you shall do. <S%H6213><s%>"

It was so, <S%H6437><s%> that when he had turned his back <S%H7926><s%> to go <S%H3212><s%> from Samuel, <S%H8050><s%> God <S%H3212><s%> gave <S%H2015><s%> him another <S%H312><s%> heart: <S%H3820><s%> and all those signs <S%H226><s%> happened <S%H935><s%> that day. <S%H3117><s%>

When they came <S%H935><s%> there to the hill, <S%H1389><s%> behold, <S%H2256><s%> a band of prophets <S%H5030><s%> met <S%H7125><s%> him; <S%H7307><s%> and the Spirit of God <S%H430><s%> came <S%H6743><s%> mightily on him, <S%H5012><s%> and he prophesied among them. <S%H8432><s%>

It happened, <S%H3045><s%> when all who knew him before <S%H865><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that, <S%H5012><s%> behold, he prophesied with the prophets, <S%H5030><s%> then the people <S%H5971><s%> said <S%H559><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to another, <S%H7453><s%> "What is this that has come to the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kish? <S%H7027><s%> Is Saul <S%H7586><s%> also among the prophets? <S%H5030><s%>"

One <S%H376><s%> of the same place answered, <S%H6030><s%> "Who is their father? <S%H1><s%>" Therefore it became a proverb, <S%H4912><s%> "Is Saul <S%H7586><s%> also among the prophets? <S%H5030><s%>"
When he had made an end <S%H3615><s%> of prophesying, <S%H5012><s%> he came <S%H935><s%> to the high place. <S%H1116><s%>

Saul <S%H7586><s%>'s uncle <S%H1730><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him and to his servant, <S%H5288><s%> "Where <S%H575><s%> did you go? <S%H1980><s%>" He said, <S%H559><s%> "To seek <S%H1245><s%> the donkeys. <S%H860><s%> When we saw <S%H7200><s%> that they were not found, <S%H369><s%> we came <S%H935><s%> to Samuel. <S%H8050><s%>"
Saul <S%H7586><s%>'s uncle <S%H1730><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Please tell <S%H5046><s%> me what Samuel <S%H8050><s%> said to you. <S%H559><s%>"

Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his uncle, <S%H1730><s%> "He told <S%H559><s%> us plainly <S%H5046><s%> that the donkeys <S%H860><s%> were found. <S%H4672><s%>" But concerning the matter <S%H1697><s%> of the kingdom, <S%H4410><s%> of which Samuel <S%H8050><s%> spoke, <S%H559><s%> he didn't <S%H5046><s%> tell him.
Samuel <S%H8050><s%> called <S%H6817><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> together to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> to Mizpah; <S%H4709><s%>

and he said <S%H559><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> "Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> <S%H5927><s%> 'I brought up Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and I delivered <S%H5337><s%> you out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%> and out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of all the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> that oppressed you: <S%H3905><s%>'

but you have this day <S%H3117><s%> rejected <S%H3988><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> who himself saves <S%H3467><s%> you out of all your calamities <S%H7451><s%> and your distresses; <S%H6869><s%> and you have said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H7760><s%> 'No! Set a king <S%H4428><s%> over us. <S%H3320><s%>' Now therefore present yourselves before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> by your tribes, <S%H7626><s%> and by your thousands. <S%H505><s%>"
So Samuel <S%H8050><s%> brought all the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> near, <S%H7126><s%> and the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> was taken. <S%H3920><s%>

He brought the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> by their families; <S%H4940><s%> and the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Matrites <S%H4309><s%> was taken; <S%H3920><s%> and Saul <S%H7586><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kish <S%H7027><s%> was taken: <S%H3920><s%> but when they sought <S%H1245><s%> him, <S%H4672><s%> he could not be found.

Therefore they asked <S%H7592><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> further, <S%H376><s%> "Is there yet a man to come <S%H935><s%> here? <S%H1988><s%>" Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> answered, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H2244><s%> he has hidden himself among the baggage. <S%H3627><s%>"

They ran <S%H7323><s%> and fetched <S%H3947><s%> him there; <S%H3320><s%> and when he stood among <S%H8432><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> he was higher <S%H1361><s%> than any of the people <S%H5971><s%> from his shoulders <S%H7926><s%> and upward. <S%H4605><s%>

Samuel <S%H8050><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to all the people, <S%H5971><s%> "You see <S%H7200><s%> him whom Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has chosen, <S%H977><s%> that there is none like him among all the people? <S%H5971><s%>" All the people <S%H5971><s%> shouted, <S%H7321><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Let the king <S%H4428><s%> live! <S%H2421><s%>"

Then Samuel <S%H8050><s%> told <S%H1696><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> the regulations <S%H4941><s%> of the kingdom, <S%H4410><s%> and wrote <S%H3789><s%> it in a book, <S%H5612><s%> and laid it up <S%H3240><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> Samuel <S%H8050><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> all the people <S%H5971><s%> away, <S%H7971><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> to his house. <S%H1004><s%>

Saul <S%H7586><s%> also went <S%H1980><s%> to his house <S%H1004><s%> to Gibeah; <S%H1390><s%> and there went <S%H3212><s%> with him the army, <S%H2428><s%> whose hearts <S%H3820><s%> God <S%H430><s%> had touched. <S%H5060><s%>

But certain worthless <S%H1100><s%> fellows <S%H1121><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "How shall this man save <S%H3467><s%> us? <S%H959><s%>" They despised him, <S%H935><s%> and brought him no present. <S%H4503><s%> But he held his peace. <S%H2790><s%>
